                            disabled: false, // æ˜¯å¦ç¦ç”¨

                              // æœªèµ°è¿œç¨‹è¯·æ±‚çš„ä¸‹æ‹‰æ•°æ®

                            ],
                            remote: false, // æ˜¯å¦å¼€å¯è¿œç¨‹è¯·æ±‚

                            remote: true,
                            remoteOptions: [],
                            props: { value: 'age', label: 'name' },
                            remoteFunc: 'getDrugName'
                          },
                          name: 'è¯å“åç§°',
                          model: 'drug_name',
                        }
                      ]
                    }
                  ],
                  options: { gutter: 0, justify: 'start', align: 'top' },
                  name: 'æ …æ ¼å¸ƒå±€',
                  model: 'grid_1665644238000_31981',
                }
              ],
              config: { 
                labelWidth: 90, 
                labelPosition: 'right', 
                size: 'small', 
                customClass: '' 
              }
            },
            remoteList: {
              getDrugName(resolve) {
                // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿæ¥å£è¯·æ±‚
                setTimeout(() => {
                  const options = [
                    { age: '1', name: 'è¯å“1' },
                    { age: '2', name: 'è¯å“2' },
                    { age: '3', name: 'è¯å“3' }
                  ]
                  resolve(options)
                }, 1000)
              }
            }
          }
        },
        methods: {
          handleDataChange(field, value, data) {
            console.log(field, value, data)
          },
          handleSubmit() {
            this.$refs.awForm
              .getData()
              .then((data) => {
                 console.log('è¡¨å•æäº¤æ•°æ®:')
                 console.log(data)
              })
              .catch((e) => {
                console.log('è¡¨å•æ•°æ®æœªå¡«å†™å®Œæ•´')
              })
          }
        }
      }
    </script>

      <template>
      <aw-form 
      :data="formColumns" 
      :value="widgetModels" 
      :remote="remoteList" 
      @on-change="handleDataChange" 
      ref="awForm">
        <template slot="footer">
          <el-button 
          icon="el-icon-circle-close" 
          :size="formColumns.config.size">é‡ ç½®</el-button>
          <el-button 
          icon="el-icon-circle-check" 
          type="primary" 
          :size="formColumns.config.size"
          @click="handleSubmit">ç¡® è®¤</el-button>
        </template>
      </aw-form>
    </template>
  
    <script>
      export default {
        data() {
          return {
            defaultValue:{
              input:'12',
              checkbox:['2','3']
            },
            formColumns:{
              list: [
                {
                  type: 'grid',
                  name: 'æ …æ ¼å¸ƒå±€',
                  columns: [
                    {
                      span: 10,
                      list: [
                        {
                          type: 'input',
                          name: 'è¾“å…¥æ¡†',
                          model: 'input',
                          options: { 
                            defaultValue:"",
                            disabled:false,
                            showWordLimit:true,
                            maxlength:4
                          },
                        }
                      ]
                    },
                    {
                      span: 14,
                      list: [
                        {
                          type: 'checkbox',
                          name: 'å¤šé€‰æ¡†ç»„',
                          model: 'checkbox',
                          options: {
                            defaultValue: [],
                            inline: true,
                            options: [
                              { value: '1', label: 'Option1' },
                              { value: '2', label: 'Option2' },
                              { value: '3', label: 'Option3' }
                            ]
                          },
                        }
                      ]
                    }
                  ],
                  options: { gutter: 20, justify: 'start', align: 'top' },
                  model: 'grid_1677130763000_69706',
                  labelWidth: 90
                }
              ],
              config: { 
                labelWidth: 90, 
                labelPosition: 'right', 
                size: 'small', 
                customClass: '', 
                footer: 'right' 
              }
            },
          }
        },
        methods: {
          handleDataChange(field, value, data) {
            console.log(field, value, data)
          },
          handleSubmit() {
            this.$refs.awForm
              .getData()
              .then((data) => {
                 console.log('è¡¨å•æäº¤æ•°æ®:')
                 console.log(data)
              })
              .catch((e) => {
                console.log('è¡¨å•æ•°æ®æœªå¡«å†™å®Œæ•´')
              })
          }
        }
      }
    </script>

      # Data-Item Attributes

      å‚æ•° è¯´æ˜ ç±»å‹ æ˜¯å¦å¿…è¦ é»˜è®¤å€¼
      type ç»„ä»¶çš„ç±»å‹ String true -

      model ç»‘å®šçš„å€¼ String false -
      rules éªŒè¯è§„åˆ™ Array false -
      options ç»„ä»¶ä¸­é…ç½®å‚æ•° Object - -
      defaultValue é»˜è®¤å€¼ Any - -
      dataType type ä¸º input æ—¶çš„æ•°æ®ç±»å‹ String - text
      showWordLimit æ˜¯å¦æ˜¾ç¤ºè¾“å…¥å­—æ•°ç»Ÿè®¡ï¼Œåªåœ¨ type = "text" æˆ– type = "textarea" æ—¶æœ‰æ•ˆ Boolean - false
      maxlength type ä¸º input æ—¶çš„æœ€å¤§è¾“å…¥é•¿åº¦ Number false -1
      width ç»„ä»¶å®½åº¦ String - -
      placeholder ç»„ä»¶å ä½å†…å®¹ String - -
      disabled æ˜¯å¦ç¦ç”¨ Boolean - false
      clearable æ˜¯å¦å¯æ¸…ç©º Boolean - false
      multiple æ˜¯å¦å¤šé€‰ Boolean - false
      filterable æ˜¯å¦å¯æœç´¢ Boolean - false
